
   	
def rev(x,y):
	t=0
	p=0

	while(x>0):
			k = x%10
			t=10*t+k
			x=x/10
	while(y>0):
			k = y%10
			p=10*p+k
			y=y/10
			
        return  (t,p)
	
def rev_single(x):
	t=0
	

	while(x>0):
			k = x%10
			t=10*t+k
			x=x/10
        return t



#print "Please enter the number of inputs"
n = int(raw_input())


for coun in range(0,n):
	
	a,b = raw_input().split()
    	a = int(a)
    	b = int(b)
        m,n = rev(a,b)
        z=m+n
        print rev_single(z)
